name: Toast
description: Transient notification message for feedback on user actions with auto-dismiss and pause on hover

accessibility.screenReader: Uses role=status with aria-live=polite for non-intrusive announcements. aria-atomic ensures complete message is announced. Dismiss button has accessible label. Progress bar is decorative.
knownLimitations: Very short duration toasts may be dismissed before screen reader completes announcement

recommendedUsage: Use for transient feedback on actions (save confirmation, error notification). Configure appropriate duration. Pause auto-dismiss on hover. Provide action button for undo or retry operations.
antiPatterns: Do not use for persistent information - use Alert instead. Avoid showing multiple toasts simultaneously. Do not use for critical errors requiring user action.
